channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump’s border czar is pulling 700 immigration officers out of Minnesota immediately
item.description: President Donald Trump’s border czar says he is reducing the number of immigration enforcement officers in Minnesota after state and local officials agreed to turn over arrested immigrants.

item.title: Savannah Guthrie posts message to her mother’s kidnapper asking to provide proof she is alive
Arizona Department of Public Safety helicopter crash kills pilot and trooper during shooter response
